These files were retrieved on an ubuntu 14.04.4 machine as follows.

cd /tmp
mkdir pkgs
cd pkgs
apt-get --allow-unauthenticated download  curl libasn1-8-heimdal libcurl3 libgssapi-krb5-2 libgssapi3-heimdal libhcrypto4-heimdal libheimbase1-heimdal libheimntlm0-heimdal libhx509-5-heimdal libidn11 libk5crypto3 libkeyutils1 libkrb5-26-heimdal libkrb5-3 libkrb5support0 libldap-2.4-2 libroken18-heimdal librtmp0 libsasl2-2 libsasl2-modules-db libwind0-heimdal openssl psmisc
